January 29, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
This piece reminds me of the legacy version we just got in Empyre; not having stealth or some kind of defense does hurt it a bit; however, getting a cheap taxi for Avengers with prob is fantastic. My only issue is with this character is the limitation of having 4 range; I have observed in the last 6 weeks of playing in person that anything less than 8 range puts one at a distinct and severe disadvantage. Despite this the new Black Widow can grant people stealth so I'm looking forward to trying them both out to see there playability.
